column4: what part of my system do I edit to make 'umount' work via the drives eject button ?
if that's possible at all probably ACPI or the kernel
interesteds: Is hotplug not handling this, i somehow was under the impression if  the device is not busy it would unmount and eject it on button press.
nope not in ubuntu its not set as that type of default behavior although i'm surprised considering their ease of use philosophy
